D

DEAL - Enum constant in enum Model.Cards.DeckType
 
DealCard - Class in Model.Cards
Implements the Card Interface and it contains all the data needed for a DealCard and the methods to access and transform the data
DealCard(String[], int) - Constructor for class Model.Cards.DealCard
constructor: Constructs a new DealCard with the given parameter info and cardNumber
Precondition: info is not null and contains all the necessary data for the card and cardNumber is between 0 and 19
postcondition: Creates and initializes a DealCard with the given info (which is a String[] with the Title, type, buy price, sell price, imagePath, message and the 2 choices of the card) and cardNumber (the number of the order of the card on the board).
DealCardTest - Class in JUnitTests
 
DealCardTest() - Constructor for class JUnitTests.DealCardTest
 
DealTile - Class in Model.Tiles
Subclass of Tile, the only difference from Tile is the action method that performs the necessary actions of each round
DealTile() - Constructor for class Model.Tiles.DealTile
constructor: Constructs a new DealTile with the given parameters orderNumber, imagePath and numberOfMessageCards
postcondition: Creates and initializes a DealTile with the given orderNumber and imagePath
DeckType - Enum in Model.Cards
 
Dice - Class in Model
This is the class of a dice.
Dice() - Constructor for class Model.Dice
constructor: Constructs a new Dice
postcondition: Creates and initializes a Dice with null owner and one as the previous roll (and the imagePath accordingly so that the image is a dice with a 1 roll)
Dice(Player) - Constructor for class Model.Dice
constructor: Constructs a new Dice
postcondition: Creates and initializes a Dice with p as the owner and one as the previous roll (and the imagePath accordingly so that the image is a dice with a 1 roll)
DiceRollListener() - Constructor for class Controller.Controller.DiceRollListener
 
DiceTest - Class in JUnitTests
 
DiceTest() - Constructor for class JUnitTests.DiceTest
 
drawDealCard() - Method in class Controller.Controller
Transformer: Draws a deal card from the deck, calls the gui to show the card that was drawn to the players and then if the player decides to buy it the card is returned, else it is added to the removed deal cards deck and null is returned
postcondition: The deal card has been drawn, shown to the players and the player decides what to do with the card.
drawMailCard() - Method in class Controller.Controller
Transformer: Draws a mail card from the deck, calls the gui to show the card that was drawn to the players and then returns its type and value
postcondition: The mail card has been drawn, shown to the players, has been added to the removed mail cards deck, and its type and value has been returned
